item.title: Interactive UK Election Dot Density Map
item.description: Shiny App that visualises the density of electoral votes for each party in 2017 and 2015 General Elections as well as the EU Referendum.

item.title: Antivia Decision-Point Dashboard Catalog
item.description: Use username: culture password: insight to log into our public Decision-Point catalog and check out some of our example dashboards.
